title: :: Comin ' s research and CEO ' s salaries
subtitle: The online cash claim Suzanne J. Comin Breast Cancer only gives 20% of its contributions to cancer research and its CEO pays $684,000 a year.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Susan G. Comin breast cancer gives only 20% of its contributions to cancer research and pays the CEO $684,000 a year.
